landing.title: Neumann
landing.subtitle: Transform your life through structured challenges, clear goals, and consistent growth.

challenges.title: Structured Challenges
challenges.description: Complete daily challenges building powerful habits. One active challenge at a time to maintain focus.

goals.title: Life Goals
goals.description: Define and achieve your most important goals. Celebrate each achievement with special trophies.

trophies.title: Achievement Trophies
trophies.description: Earn permanent trophies by completing your life goals. Build your legacy of achievements.

community.title: Communities and Rankings
community.description: Join communities, share challenges, and evolve alongside others. Track your progress in the global ranking based on level, XP, and achievements.

focus.title: üéØ Focus and Discipline
focus.description: One challenge at a time. Focus your energy on what really matters.

progress.title: üìà Visible and Gamified Progress
progress.description: Track every victory. Trophy and level achievements that show your evolution.

achievements.title: üèÜ Real Achievements
achievements.description: Transform goals into accomplishments. Every completed goal is a permanent trophy.

mission.title: üöÄ Mission
mission.description: We believe that through commitment and consistency in overcoming challenges, achieving goals, and forming good habits, users can unlock their full potential and achieve high performance in their capabilities and skills.
